what caused this accident well we know
is that this is a very routine flight
from Taipei to the outlying island of
demon and it normally takes just one
hour many flights go between Taipei and
Kingman and other outlying islands every
day and even though the airport is
located right in town and there's a lot
of buildings and highways and bridges
this has never happened before in Taiwan
so this is quite a shock to a lot of
people we don't know what might have
caused the pilots to lose control of the
aircraft but we do know that is that
they are very experienced pilots the
main pilot had about 4,900 hours of

hours of flight time in this aircraft it
was practically brand-new or still in
April last year and I just passed an

know why a routine
like could have gone so wrong
